paragraphs.body: With the advent of the Fanon Subscription Module on Avatar Wiki, the process of handing out mass subscriptions and notifications to dozens of message walls has been made far easier. Utilizing client-to-server input functions integrated in the host MediaWiki software, the tool is able to rapidly mass post on walls given a list of target users.
paragraphs.text: With the advent of the Fanon Subscription Module on Avatar Wiki, the process of handing out mass subscriptions and notifications to dozens of message walls has been made far easier. Utilizing client-to-server input functions integrated in the host MediaWiki software, the tool is able to rapidly mass post on walls given a list of target users.

paragraphs.body: Due to the potential for misuse, only users listed on our local ${link_0} will be able to load the module. Users may request to be put on the checkpage ${link_1}.  Furthermore, the unique capabilities of the tool are subject to a few regulations and limitations, to be noted by users with access as well as applicants petitioning for the use of this apparatus.
paragraphs.text: Due to the potential for misuse, only users listed on our local checkpage will be able to load the module. Users may request to be put on the checkpage here.  Furthermore, the unique capabilities of the tool are subject to a few regulations and limitations, to be noted by users with access as well as applicants petitioning for the use of this apparatus.

paragraphs.body: In addition to adhering to all relevant ${link_0}, users given access must not:
paragraphs.text: In addition to adhering to all relevant behavioral policies, users given access must not:

paragraphs.body: Users found to have breached these conventions without appropriate reason or explanation will be removed from the checkpage indefinitely.
paragraphs.text: Users found to have breached these conventions without appropriate reason or explanation will be removed from the checkpage indefinitely.

paragraphs.body: Access to the module will be withdrawn upon the conclusion of all active and eligible major works of a user on the fanon portal, as they will no longer require its use.
paragraphs.text: Access to the module will be withdrawn upon the conclusion of all active and eligible major works of a user on the fanon portal, as they will no longer require its use.

paragraphs.body: Please note that a fanon "in limbo" with an inactive author has not necessarily been discontinued.
paragraphs.text: Please note that a fanon "in limbo" with an inactive author has not necessarily been discontinued.

paragraphs.body: Watch what happens to Yuhan when you leave him in a cursed labyrinth by himself...
paragraphs.text: Watch what happens to Yuhan when you leave him in a cursed labyrinth by himself...
